scripts.start: npm run --prefix ./back-end start && npm run --prefix ./front-end start
scripts.install: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.dev: npm run --prefix ./back-end dev && npm run --prefix ./front-end start
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend:coverage && npm run test:frontend:coverage
